title: New: Black Honey – Hello Today
body:
There’s an almost shoegaze quality to the intro on this new **Black Honey** track – the percussion section reminds me quite a lot of 90’s legends Ride.

Songwriting wise it’s somewhat snappier and more direct – two and half minutes of grit infused pop. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
